subject: Advertising and Marketing
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L.’s promotional machine has leaned overwhelmingly on Sidney Crosby from the moment Pittsburgh drafted him as the No. 1 overall choice in 2005.
snippet: The N.H.L.’s promotional machine has leaned overwhelmingly on Sidney Crosby from the moment Pittsburgh drafted him as the No. 1 overall choice in 2005.
